title: cant get into ranked since 5.16
body:
I dont know if this is happening to anyone else but i  havent been able to get into ranked since this new patch it feels like the servers are empty
i get massive que times and when i finally get a game only 9 people say yes and then when i finally got a game where everyone said yes ( there has only been one since patch) it said cant find active game and kept searching

replies.body:
run the installer again, but instead of clicking remove or reinstall click repair, this will fix up any corrupted files while keeping it installed and to needing to run that massive install patch.

in other words, a quick time saving install
try uninstalling the game then reinstalling it. if that doesn't work go to riot support
this is a problem on your end not riot a corrupt file
